All,

In spite of the one feedback message I got that my recent post about
abstract vs. concrete parameters was clear, I expanded the idea into a
paper: www.threeriversinstitute.org/AbstractVsConcreteParameters.html. In
short, it tries to resolve the apparent contradiction between achieving
testable code sometimes by making parameters concrete and sometimes by
making parameters abstract. I'd appreciate feedback, examples, and
counter-examples.

Regards,

Kent Beck
Three Rivers Institute
